pullrequest.title: Use ign-math3 during the transition to ign-cmake

content.raw:
I had it like that originally and then decided to change it to this in order to emphasize the branch change. I think it's easy to forget about the trailing `-b ign-math3` at the end of the long URL, and I'm worried that we'll forget to change that part of the instructions later on when we're ready to take another step forward.

If you think it would be better to consolidate those lines into one, I'm certainly open to that.
content.html:
I had it like that originally and then decided to change it to this in order to emphasize the branch change. I think it's easy to forget about the trailing -b ign-math3 at the end of the long URL, and I'm worried that we'll forget to change that part of the instructions later on when we're ready to take another step forward.

If you think it would be better to consolidate those lines into one, I'm certainly open to that.
